meta.title: Getting started with Sequelize
meta.description: Sequelize is a promise-based Node.js ORM for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite and Microsoft SQL Server. It features solid transaction support, relations, eager and lazy loading and more.

body:
Installing Sequelize

$ npm install sequelize

Official Documentation

  • Sequelize v5
  • Sequelize v4
  • Sequelize v3
